title: KaOS Linux 2024.01 Released with a Pure KDE Plasma 6-Based Environment
description:
KaOS Linux 2024.01 independent distribution inspired by Arch Linux is now available for download with a pure KDE Plasma 6-based environment.

The post KaOS Linux 2024.01 Released with a Pure KDE Plasma 6-Based Environment appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Clonezilla Live 3.1.2 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS and Memtest86+ 7.00
description:
Clonezilla Live 3.1.2 live system for disk cloning and imaging is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.6 LTS and featuring updated components and various enhancements.

The post Clonezilla Live 3.1.2 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS and Memtest86+ 7.00 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Immutable Distro Nitrux 3.3 Is Out Now Powered by Linux Kernel 6.7
description:
Nitrux 3.3 systemd-free and immutable distribution is now available for download powered by the latest Linux 6.7 kernel series. Here's what's new!

The post Immutable Distro Nitrux 3.3 Is Out Now Powered by Linux Kernel 6.7 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: OBS Studio 30.1 Beta Adds AV1 Support for VA-API, PipeWire Camera Source
description:
OBS Studio 30.1 is now available for public beta testing with AV1 support for VA-API, PipeWire Camera source, HDR for HEVC over RTMP, and many other new features.

The post OBS Studio 30.1 Beta Adds AV1 Support for VA-API, PipeWire Camera Source appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
